team.description: The ID of the team as a string

alert_name.description: Name of the alert, mostly for reference in the UI and notification emails

prompt_filters.description:
A list of strings to scan for, with wildcard (`word*`), negation (`word NOT unwanted_word`), and phrase (`"word word"`) support
Has to be between 1 and 10 items.

alert_enabled.description: Whether the alert should run or be paused. `true` or `false`.

notification_email.description: An email address to send a notification to when a new mention is found. Defaults to your account's email or the team's email if set.

notification_summary_enabled.description: Whether to send a summary of the alert's mentions instead of one email per mention. `true` or `false`.

notification_summary_frequency.description: How often to send a summary of the alert's mentions. `daily`, `weekly`, or `monthly`.

webhook_enabled.description: Whether to send a POST request to a URL when a new mention is found. `true` or `false`.

webhook_url.description: A URL to send a POST request to when a new mention is found. The request will contain a JSON object with the mention's details.

prompt_question_enabled.description: Whether to ask an AI-answered question of teh transcript when a new mention is found. `true` or `false`. Defaults to `false`.

prompt_question.description: The Yes/No question to ask the AI when a new mention is found. Only used if `prompt_question_enabled` is `true`.

restrict_to_category_ids.description: A comma-separated list of category IDs to restrict the alert to. If not set, the alert will scan all categories.

ignore_category_ids.description: A comma-separated list of category IDs to ignore for the alert. If not set, the alert will ignore no categories.

restrict_to_podcast_ids.description: A comma-separated list of podcast IDs to restrict the alert to. If not set, the alert will scan all podcasts.

ignore_podcast_ids.description: A comma-separated list of podcast IDs to ignore for the alert. If not set, the alert will ignore no podcasts.
